name: Vitalize Care
headline: Streamlining Clinical Operations for Health Systems
description:
Vitalize Care is solving the most pressing clinical operations problems for health systems, starting with optimizing staffing and scheduling. We help hospitals dramatically reduce labor spend, improve operational efficiency, and unburden clinical leaders from hours of work per day.

We're partnered with some of the country's most innovative health systems, and are excited to share more details soon!

founders.name: Veeraj Shah, Founder
founders.description: I'm an MD/PhD student turned founder of Vitalize, where we work with healthcare employers to improve the mental health + productivity of their staff. Prior to Vitalize, I co-founded two behavioral health nonprofits and co-led digital health strategy initiatives for the US Surgeon General and IBM. Originally got interested in healthcare through informatics research, where my most recent work was funded by the Gates Foundation. Love chatting about all things hiking and coffee!

founders.name: Sanketh Andhavarapu, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer of Vitalize Care, where we work with healthcare employers to improve the mental health of their staff. Prior to Vitalize, I co-founded a revenue-generating education nonprofit, and also conducted clinical, basic science, and health services research, co-authoring over 20 peer-reviewed publications. Previously led business development for seed-stage pediatric healthtech startup, and was also a fellow with .406 Ventures.

raw_markdown="[Vitalize Care![Vitalize Care Logo](https://vitalize.care/logo.svg)](https://vitalize.care/</>)
Open main menu
[Our Solution](https://vitalize.care/</our-solution>)[Why Vitalize](https://vitalize.care/</why-vitalize>)Contact Us
[Login](https://vitalize.care/<https:/app.vitalize.care>)
# Reduce Labor Spend and Retain Nurses through Optimized Staffing
Vitalize Care helps health systems efficiently staff to real time patient demand and acuity.
Our platform leverages predictive scheduling to proactively identify staffing gaps and automate filling shifts with the best-fit nurse.
Request Demo
![Vitalize Care Logo](https://vitalize.care/_next/image?url=%2Flanding%2Fhero-graphic.png&w=1200&q=75)![Vitalize Care Logo](https://vitalize.care/landing/blue-gradient.svg)![Vitalize Care Logo](https://vitalize.care/landing/purple-gradient.svg)
# Why Leading Health Systems Work with Us
Vitalize Care provides an all-in-one scheduling, staffing, reporting, and analytics solution for health systems. Our AI enables hospitals to easily deploy staff to meet present patient acuity and throughput. No more overstaffing or resorting to bonus pay.
![Reduce Premium](https://vitalize.care/landing/helps-health-systems/reduce-premium.svg)
**Reduce** premium labor spend and traveler/agency utilization
![Save Time](https://vitalize.care/landing/helps-health-systems/save-time.svg)
**Save nurse leaders > 30% time** by automating manual scheduling tasks
![Productivity](https://vitalize.care/landing/helps-health-systems/productivity.svg)
Enable unit level leaders to **manage productivity in real-time**
![Retention](https://vitalize.care/landing/helps-health-systems/retention.svg)
**Improve nurse retention** through schedule flexibility + transparency
# We Target the Biggest Opportunities to Reduce Labor Cost and Save Frontline Managers Time
Ensuring that units are appropriately staffed every shift is a Herculean task. With patient census and acuity changing every few hours, last minute callouts, and overburdened managers, staffing is an operational nightmare.
# Integrate Predictive Scheduling
We identify probabilistic scheduling gaps months in advance, and fill these gaps with the best-fit staff.
![Central Staffing](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/integrate.svg)
![Nurse Manager Dashboard](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/real-time.svg)
# Staff in Real-Time to Census and Acuity without Hiring Additional FTE’s
We enable a house supervisor or small operations team to match the efficiency of a large staffing office - no more unnecessary huddles, phone calls, and spreadsheets.
![Nurse Manager Dashboard](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/real-time.svg)
# Unburden Nurse Managers from Manual Scheduling
We enable nurse managers to focus on key priority areas such as retaining nurses, patient engagement, and more.
![Nurse-Facing App](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/unburden.svg)
![Nurse-Facing App](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/cost-optimize.svg)
# Cost Optimize the Entire Staffing Process
Our algorithm identifies the best-fit staff for every shift, and recommend an optimal bonus if needed.
![Nurse-Facing App](https://vitalize.care/landing/biggest-opportunities/cost-optimize.svg)
### Vitalize Care provides value to Frontline Staff and Across the C-Suite
## CNOs
Visualize staffing across the house in real-time, and proactively adjust staffing due to callouts and changing census.
## COOs
Streamline staffing operations without hiring costly FTE’s.
## CFOs
Reduce premium labor spend and traveler utilization through cost-optimized staffing.
## Nurse Managers
Save 1 - 2 hours daily by automating manually burdensome scheduling tasks.
## Frontline Staff
Flexible and transparent scheduling at your fingertips.
Schedule Demo
832 Sansome St., Lower LevelSan Francisco, CA 94111
Hours:• Open 24 hours: Mon-Sat• Closed: Sun

generated_description:
Vitalize Care is a San Francisco-based startup launched in 2022 that's tackling the inefficiencies of clinical operations in health systems. It's part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, which speaks to its innovative approach and potential. The company's mission? Simplifying clinical operations to help hospitals optimize staffing and scheduling. 

At its core, Vitalize Care focuses on three key problems: reducing labor expenses, improving operational efficiency, and relieving clinical leaders of the tedious manual work that eats up their time. They're developing a software platform that uses predictive scheduling to identify staffing gaps well ahead of time, ensuring that health systems can deploy the right nurses to meet patient needs without excessive labor costs.

The platform offers an integrated solution for staffing and scheduling, which means no more overstaffing or scrambling to fill shifts at the last moment. Through AI, Vitalize Care automates much of the scheduling process, saving nurse leaders significant time each day (by over 30%, in some cases). This not only streamlines operations but also aims to improve nurse retention with more flexible and transparent scheduling options. 

With a small but dedicated team of just 13 employees, Vitalize Care is already partnering with some of the most innovative health systems across the country. Tom Blomfield serves as their Group Partner, lending further credibility to their mission.

The benefits of their solution are felt across the hospital hierarchy—from Chief Nursing Officers who can visualize staffing in real-time to COOs who want to make staffing operations efficient without hiring additional full-time employees. CFOs see reduced labor spend, while nurse managers save hours of scheduling headaches.

To sum up, Vitalize Care is positioned to transform how health systems manage staffing, allowing them to respond proactively to the ever-changing landscape of patient care. If you want to learn more, you can check out their offerings at [Vitalize Care’s website](https://vitalize.care).
